content: lion brand pattern # 70346ad skill level easy + level 3 860-099 vanna s choice yarn linen 11 balls crochet hook - size j-10 6 mm gauge basic square = 5-3/4 in 14 5 cm measured diagonally from corner to corner special stitch decrease single_crochet decrease make 111 basic squares and 16 half squares sew basic squares and half squares together following diagram crochet border edging and attach 14 tassels 7 for each tip on top and bottom
